Player History
Released by Cleveland on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 2nd round, 27th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1968...
Traded from Baltimore to Los Angeles on 3/2/1968 (Going to BAL: C D. Pick. Going to LA: P B. Babcock)...
Injured on 4/29/1973 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 9/22/1975...
Injured on 9/13/1977 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/13/1981 to a 3-year deal worth $1,750,000 per year...
Injured on 8/13/1981 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
